title: A Lovely Dilemma
description: Agnes is a successful, modern woman. Independent and confident, she has settled into married life with her financial analyst husband, Benedict. But Benedict's frequent travels have put a silent strain in their relationship. One night, while Benedict is out of the country, Agnes meets Michael. She doesn't know there's anything missing in her life until she meets Michael. Together they embark on a sizzling affair, where Agnes experiences pleasures unknown to her before. For how long will their affair remain only in the realm of lust and sexual attraction before love gets in the way? Who will Agnes choose between the two? A story about love and lust, about relationships and infidelity,
author: Aischa Zorindell
